Support Rewards:
Rewards can be earned once
per day, for up to five days,
by deploying support forces.

If the boss is defeated within five
days, rewards for remaining days
can be acquired as Boss Rewards.

Mirror of Niðavellir

A mirror of hidden power that hangs above
the throne of Niðavellir—or rather, an imitation
modeled after the real thing. It's an event item.
Gullinbursti Figure

A commemorative figure built to put dvergr
craftsmanship on display, its design meant to
aid in combating larger foes. It's an event item.
Seiðjárn Gearwork

Structure common to Niðavellir, its mechanism
driven by magic. It's an event item.

$a・ This value is the maximum Lift you can earn
by making a successful attack.
・ A successful attack yields $a0 Lift. You earn
$a1 more for having a Bonus Ally in your raiding
party. (You will not receive more bonus Lift for
adding more than one Bonus Ally.)
・ In light and astra seasons, if Heroes with
matching blessings are sent out with a matching
Mythic Hero, this value will increase.
・ In light and astra seasons, this will increase
depending on the number of merges the Mythic
Hero has.

$a・ This is the largest amount of Lift you can lose
given the makeup of your defensive team.
・ The standard amount is $a0.
・ In dark and anima seasons, if Heroes with
matching blessings are sent out with a matching
Mythic Hero, this value will decrease.
・ In dark and anima seasons, this will decrease
depending on the number of merges the Mythic
Hero has.

Light/Astra Bonus Mythic Heroes:
Include one of these Heroes in
your raiding party, and you will
lose less Lift when members of
your raiding party are defeated.
Your Lift lost will be reduced as
if one fewer Heroes was defeated.

Light/Astra Mythic Effect 2:
Some Light/Astra Mythic Heroes
have an additional Mythic Effect:
Raiding Party Bonus. If such a
Hero is included in a raiding party
during the corresponding season,
a special slot can be used.

The following types of Heroes can
be used in the special slot:

・ Seasonal Legendary Heroes
・ Light/Astra seasonal Mythic
Heroes and blessed Heroes

The special-slot Hero grants no
bonus to Aetheric Lift acquisition.
(Mythic Heroes and blessed allies
will not affect boosts to Lift,
bonus Heroes will not boost Lift,
and bonus Mythic Heroes will
have no effect on Lift lost when
placed in the special slot).

Dark/Anima Bonus Mythic Heroes:
Include one of these Heroes when
defending, and if your defense
fails, you will lose less Lift. Even
if no attackers are defeated, your
Lift lost will be reduced as if one
additional attacker was defeated.

Dark/Anima Mythic Effect 2:
Some Dark/Anima Mythic Heroes
have an additional Mythic Effect:
Defensive Team Bonus. If such a
Hero is included on a defensive
team during the corresponding
season, a special slot can be used.

The following types of Heroes can
be used in the special slot:

・ Seasonal Legendary Heroes
・ Dark/Anima seasonal Mythic
Heroes and blessed Heroes

・ If defensive team's Heroes are
all alive at the start of their turn,
the Hero in the special slot is
treated as if they had performed
an action that turn. (The Hero in
the special slot may act normally
once at least one of its teammates
has been defeated.)

The special-slot Hero does not
affect the Lift decrease limit.
(Mythic Heroes and blessed allies
will not affect the Lift decrease
limit and bonus Mythic Heroes
will have no effect on Lift lost
when placed in the special slot).
No Heroes able to use Pair Up.
